posts.post_content: I like the fact, flavor-wise, that it powers up all elves and not just the ones under your control. Makes me imagine that tribal bonds are stronger amongst elves than loyalty to their controlling players. If two armies of elves are facing each other, they'll just let each other pass and kill the players.
posts.html:

Just find a way to give your opponent one of your forests and you've got the game won once she hits play.
